desc: Get Lit & Relax with Wilson & Co Wax. Soy candles and wax melts homemade and hand poured local here in PA. Our candles, and melts are made of a high-quality 100% soy wax for a long-lasting fragrance. We also offer other products like car air fresheners, reed diffusers, body products and more.

layout.text: Get Lit & Relax with Wilson & Co Wax
Our candles, and melts are made of a high-quality 100% soy wax for a long-lasting fragrance. We also offer other products like car air fresheners, reed diffusers, and more.
